mapper.select: SELECT categoryId, categoryName, enabled, orderNo FROM productCategory ORDER BY orderNo ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO productCategory(categoryId, categoryName, enabled, orderNo) VALUES(productCategory_seq.NEXTVAL, #{categoryName}, 1, #{orderNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE productCategory SET categoryName = #{categoryName}, enabled = #{enabled}, orderNo = #{orderNo} WHERE categoryId = #{categoryId}
